item.title: Asus ROG STRIX Z590-E GAMING WIFI - my UEFI BIOS settings
item.description: I’ve build new PC - it’s based on Asus ROG STRIX Z590-E GAMING WIFI  external link motherboard. Generally, I’m quite satisfied, but it have one irritating downside - after each UEFI BIOS upgrade, it’s silently resetting some of settings. Let me note, what I want to have there: Ai Tweaker (use my RAM capabilities) AI Overcloack Tuner -> [XMP I] DRAM Frequency -> [DDR4-3600MHz] DRAM CAS# Latency -> [16] DRAM RAS# to CAS# Delay -> [19] DRAM RAS# ACT Time -> [39] DRAM Voltage -> [1.
